summary: Changes the appearance of Radiant Raiment into the clothing shop it deserves to be!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][font=Century Gothic]Radiant Raiment Overhaul[/font][/size][/center][center][size=4]
[/size][/center][center][size=4]Introduction:[/size][/center]
Have you ever wondered why Skyrim's only clothes shop doesn't really [i]look[/i] like a clothes shop? There are a few items scattered here and there but that's about it. Having made clothes for royalty (In the quest "Fit for a Jarl") surely they would be proud to show off their selection of handcrafted merchandise? My mod changes the appearance of Radiant Raiment into the clothing shop it deserves to be!

[center][size=4]Features:[/size][/center]
• Many new (mainly) static items including...
• Clothes rails
• Shoe racks with shoes and boots for commoners and boots for the Imperial army and Penitus Oculatus
• Mannequin display showcasing their finely crafted garnments
• Accessories wall
• Tanning rack
• Boxes of flowers for special occasions
• Pelts and linen behind the counter
• ... and a bargain[size=2] bin![/size]
[size=4]
[/size]
[center][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/center]
No DLC is required for RRO to work[size=2].[/size]

[center][size=4]Installation/Uninstallation:[/size][/center]
[size=2]To install, use NMM or drag and drop the .esp file into Skyrim's "Data" folder. To uninstall, untick the .esp in NMM or in the Skyrim launcher, but make sure you aren't in the Radiant Raiment cell beforehand. Also this mod has no scripts so it's safe to uninstall.[/size]
[size=4]
[/size]
[center][size=4]Conflicts:[/size][/center]
Will conflict with any mod that changes the shop portion of the "SolitudeRadiantRaiment" cell.

[center][size=4]My other mods:[/size][/center]
If you like this shop overhaul then you'll love my other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54398/?]Warmaiden's Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56131/?]Bannered Mare Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57505/?]Riverwood Trader Overhaul[/url]﻿
author: naverd01
